items.title: Trump complains Epstein files are a distraction as flight logs reveal deeper ties and ‘unfounded and false’ claims emerge
items.description: The biggest Epstein files information dump yet leaves questions unanswered.

items.title: JPMorgan to allow crypto trading for institutional clients in latest embrace of the sector
items.description: CEO Jamie Dimon appears to have reversed course from once equating Bitcoin with a “pet rock.”

items.title: ‘Cruel, unnecessary, and irresponsible’: Advocacy group slams Trump’s plan to garnish wages of student loan borrowers in default
items.description: Student loan borrowers see the end of leniency during Biden's term.

items.title: Americans enjoy one refuge from inflation: The cheapest gas prices in years
items.description: Gas below $3 is a welcome relief to many Americans.

items.title: Republican lawmaker and notable Trump critic Ben Sasse announces stage 4 cancer: ‘Now marching to the beat of a faster drummer’
items.description: “I’m not going down without a fight," said the Ivy League-educated father of three.
